statements: SELECT * FROM device_tracking;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM device_tracking;
SELECT device_name, network_provider FROM device_tracking WHERE location_latitude > 0;
SELECT * FROM device_tracking ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM device_tracking WHERE network_provider = 'Verizon';
SELECT * FROM device_tracking WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM device_tracking WHERE network_provider = 'Verizon' ORDER BY location_latitude ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM device_tracking WHERE device_type = 'Laptop';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location_latitude, location_longitude, network_provider FROM device_tracking LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM device_tracking WHERE location_latitude < 40 AND location_longitude > -100 ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_usage;
SELECT device_id, usage_data FROM device_usage;
SELECT * FROM device_location;
SELECT device_id, location_data FROM device_location;
SELECT device_id, usage_data FROM device_usage JOIN device_location ON device_usage.device_id = device_location.device_id;
SELECT * FROM device_usage WHERE device_id = 101;
SELECT device_id, usage_data FROM device_usage ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_usage JOIN device_location ON device_usage.device_id = device_location.device_id WHERE device_usage.device_id = 101;
SELECT device_id, location_data FROM device_location WHERE device_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM device_usage GROUP BY device_id HAVING num_records > 5;
SELECT * FROM tracking_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM tracking_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT data_usage, timestamp FROM device_usage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, location_name FROM tracking_devices JOIN locations ON tracking_devices.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM tracking_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM tracking_devices WHERE device_type='mobile';
SELECT location_name, region FROM locations ORDER BY region DESC;
SELECT d.device_name, du.timestamp, du.data_usage FROM tracking_devices d INNER JOIN device_usage du ON d.device_id = du.device_id WHERE d.device_type='tablet' ORDER BY du.timestamp DESC;
SELECT d.device_name, l.location_name, l.latitude, l.longitude FROM tracking_devices d JOIN locations l ON d.location_id = l.location_id WHERE d.device_type='laptop' AND l.region='Europe';
SELECT * FROM device_info;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM device_info WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT * FROM network_usage ORDER BY data_usage DESC;
SELECT location_name, country, region FROM location_info WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT activity_id, connection_type, activity_time FROM network_activity WHERE connection_type = 'WiFi' ORDER BY activity_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_info LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM device_info WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT * FROM network_usage ORDER BY data_usage DESC;
SELECT location_name, country, region FROM location_info WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT device_id, data_usage FROM network_usage JOIN device_info ON network_usage.device_id = device_info.device_id WHERE data_usage > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Device;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM Device WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, manufacture_date FROM Device ORDER BY manufacture_date DESC;
SELECT location_id, COUNT(*) AS device_count FROM Device GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT location.country, Device.device_name, Usage.data_transferred FROM Location, Device, Usage WHERE Location.location_id = Device.location_id AND Device.device_id = Usage.device_id;
SELECT * FROM Device WHERE manufacture_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM Device WHERE location_id = 3 ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Device JOIN Usage ON Device.device_id = Usage.device_id WHERE Usage.data_transferred > 1000 ORDER BY Device.manufacture_date DESC;

SELECT Device.device_name, Location.city, Network.network_name FROM Device JOIN Location ON Device.location_id = Location.location_id JOIN Network ON Device.device_id = Network.network_id WHERE Network.bandwidth_limit > 500 ORDER BY Device.device_name, Location.city;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS error_count FROM ErrorLog GROUP BY device_id HAVING error_count > 3 ORDER BY error_count DESC;
